page.title: 11Comments Around Handsacre
page.content: Some would like more action against the vandals who write graffitti on the amenites and walls.Others were digusted about the dog fouling,litter and other untidiness in the streets.There was a complaint that coal lorries travelling through the streets caused nuisance.A new pavillion is being built at Millmore Park.A few complained about the Water Board strengthening the banks of the Trent & Mersey Canal.They are worried about the time it would take.Near the Red Lion is a disused clay pit.It will be filled in for a play ground.There are many buses but they are dirty.A complaint has been made to the Transport Authorites.Some of the people who complained about litter have been seen dropping it them selves & are not prepared to take responsibility.The Parish agreed to build 400 houses.
